name: Good Clinical Practice MasterClass
content: This online practical training provides an in-depth understanding of GCP requirements and their practical implications as well as insights into the current GCP inspection focus and hot topics. We will discuss recent GCP inspection observations and GCP inspection metrics. The online course will also bring clarifications on clinical trial risk-based approaches, sponsor oversight and data integrity. #masterclass #glceurope #pharma #globaltraining #goodclinicalpractices
